job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Delivering Customer Success is an important focus for Dataiku. As a Customer Success Engineer (CSE) within our Solutions Engineering team, you'll help Dataiku's customers achieve meaningful outcomes with business analytics, AI/ML, and Gen AI.

   In this technical and consultative customer-facing role, you'll focus on technical programming to increase adoption through product enablement and one-to-many user engagement. You'll leverage your understanding of enterprise analytics, high-impact communication abilities, and hands-on data science skills to add business value. This role will also partner closely with cross-functional teams, including Account Executives, Sales Engineers, and Professional Services and Partners to accelerate end-user adoption.

   How you'll make an impact
     * Work closely with Dataiku's customers, focusing on onboarding and increasing user adoption, retention, and satisfaction.
     * Possess deep technical knowledge of the Dataiku platform to educate customers on best practices within the Dataiku platform.
     * Develop a deep understanding of customer business, use cases, and outcomes to guide their success with Dataiku's products and services.
     * Execute demonstrations of new product features and conduct hands-on workshops in collaboration with the Sales Engineers.
     * Establish regular touchpoints with customers to advise users on using Dataiku for their specific business needs, including hands-on support as appropriate.
     * Execute programs to create self-sustaining enablement and evangelism of Dataiku within customer accounts.
     * Collaborate with Account Executives and Sales Engineers to drive customer engagement with the Dataiku platform and identify opportunities for expansion (both software and professional services) that can drive additional value for customers.
     * Document and share the adoption status and key information to inform internal forecasting and renewal.
     * Collaborate with other Dataiku functions (such as marketing) to capture and share customer stories publicly.
     * When identifying technical issues that block user adoption, coach administrators and users to initiate support tickets for timely resolution.
     * Stay current on Dataiku's products, competitive landscape, and data science trends.
     * Willingness to travel up to 25%
job_details.full_text:
Customer Success Engineer, Netherlands

Delivering Customer Success is an important focus for Dataiku. As a Customer Success Engineer (CSE) within our Solutions Engineering team, you'll help Dataiku's customers achieve meaningful outcomes with business analytics, AI/ML, and Gen AI.

   In this technical and consultative customer-facing role, you'll focus on technical programming to increase adoption through product enablement and one-to-many user engagement. You'll leverage your understanding of enterprise analytics, high-impact communication abilities, and hands-on data science skills to add business value. This role will also partner closely with cross-functional teams, including Account Executives, Sales Engineers, and Professional Services and Partners to accelerate end-user adoption.

   How you'll make an impact
     * Work closely with Dataiku's customers, focusing on onboarding and increasing user adoption, retention, and satisfaction.
     * Possess deep technical knowledge of the Dataiku platform to educate customers on best practices within the Dataiku platform.
     * Develop a deep understanding of customer business, use cases, and outcomes to guide their success with Dataiku's products and services.
     * Execute demonstrations of new product features and conduct hands-on workshops in collaboration with the Sales Engineers.
     * Establish regular touchpoints with customers to advise users on using Dataiku for their specific business needs, including hands-on support as appropriate.
     * Execute programs to create self-sustaining enablement and evangelism of Dataiku within customer accounts.
     * Collaborate with Account Executives and Sales Engineers to drive customer engagement with the Dataiku platform and identify opportunities for expansion (both software and professional services) that can drive additional value for customers.
     * Document and share the adoption status and key information to inform internal forecasting and renewal.
     * Collaborate with other Dataiku functions (such as marketing) to capture and share customer stories publicly.
     * When identifying technical issues that block user adoption, coach administrators and users to initiate support tickets for timely resolution.
     * Stay current on Dataiku's products, competitive landscape, and data science trends.
     * Willingness to travel up to 25%

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on customer success, product enablement, and consultative support for a data analytics platform (Dataiku). While it mentions AI/ML and Gen AI in the context of customer use cases, the core responsibilities are centered around increasing adoption, user engagement, and providing hands-on support for the platform itself, rather than developing, building, or deploying AI models. The role is technical and consultative but does not involve core AI engineering tasks like algorithm development, model training, or MLOps. It leans more towards a customer-facing technical support and enablement role, which aligns with the 'Ambiguous' profile as it's not a core AI engineering role.

job_tasks.justification: The role requires understanding customer business, use cases, and outcomes to guide their success with Dataiku's products and services, and to advise users on using Dataiku for their specific business needs.
job_tasks.phrase: Develop a deep understanding of customer business, use cases, and outcomes to guide their success with Dataiku's products and services.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves collaborating with sales teams to identify opportunities for expansion that can drive additional value for customers, which requires understanding business needs and potential growth areas.
job_tasks.phrase: identify opportunities for expansion (both software and professional services) that can drive additional value for customers.

job_tasks.justification: The job description mentions 'hands-on data science skills' and helping customers achieve outcomes with 'AI/ML, and Gen AI', implying some level of understanding and application of these concepts, although the focus is on enablement rather than development.
The role involves educating customers on best practices within the Dataiku platform, which includes AI/ML and Gen AI, suggesting a need to understand and explain these modeling concepts.

The role is described as 'technical programming' to increase adoption and involves educating customers on best practices within the Dataiku platform, which requires a technical understanding of software and its application.
The role involves executing demonstrations of new product features and conducting hands-on workshops, which requires a deep understanding of the software platform and its functionalities.
job_tasks.phrase: Execute demonstrations of new product features and conduct hands-on workshops

job_tasks.justification: The role involves coaching administrators and users to initiate support tickets for timely resolution of technical issues that block user adoption, which is a form of operational support and issue management.
job_tasks.phrase: coach administrators and users to initiate support tickets for timely resolution.

job_tasks.justification: The role is described as 'technical and consultative customer-facing' and requires 'high-impact communication abilities'.
The role requires partnering closely with cross-functional teams including Account Executives, Sales Engineers, and Professional Services.
The role involves collaborating with other Dataiku functions to capture and share customer stories publicly.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with other Dataiku functions (such as marketing) to capture and share customer stories publicly.

job_tasks.justification: The role requires staying current on Dataiku's products, competitive landscape, and data science trends.
job_tasks.phrase: Stay current on Dataiku's products, competitive landscape, and data science trends.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves identifying technical issues that block user adoption and coaching users towards resolution.
job_tasks.phrase: When identifying technical issues that block user adoption, coach administrators and users to initiate support tickets for timely resolution.

job_tasks.justification: The role focuses on increasing user adoption, retention, and satisfaction, and executing programs to create self-sustaining enablement and evangelism, which implies taking ownership of customer success.
job_tasks.phrase: Execute programs to create self-sustaining enablement and evangelism of Dataiku within customer accounts.

soft_skills.phrase: Stay current on Dataiku's products, competitive landscape, and data science trends.
When identifying technical issues that block user adoption, coach administrators and users to initiate support tickets for timely resolution.
Execute programs to create self-sustaining enablement and evangelism of Dataiku within customer accounts.
